actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.
Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings with an amendment. With written report No. 101-319.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 591.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to remove certain prohibitions to the licensing of a vessel for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel Arctic Sounder.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.

titles.title: A bill to remove certain prohibitions to the licensing of a vessel for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel Arctic Sounder.
